docs.abstract: article on how to stop smoking; drawing (M)

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: BY THE END of last year, a national survey showed, 33 million Americans 38 percent of those who had ever been regular smokers had given up cigarettes, Of the 54 million Americans who Still smoke, two out of three say they would like to quit and have tried to at least once.
